name: registrar
content:
registrar noun [C]
(RECORD KEEPER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an official whose job is to keep official records, especially of births, deaths, and marriages
at some colleges, an official in charge of exams, keeping records, and new students

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
University & college education
registrar noun [C]
(DOCTOR)
UK a hospital doctor who is training to become a consultant (= a hospital doctor at the highest level with special training in and knowledge of a particular area of medicine): A hospital registrar is of a lower rank than a consultant.

a person who keeps records, esp. a college or university official who is responsible for students’ records of classes and marks
Add to word list
Add to word list
LAW, STOCK MARKET a person or organization whose job is to keep official records, especially of changes in who owns shares in a company: The stockbroker will conduct the transaction on screen and notify the share registrar, all with the press of a button. See also
Registrar of Companies
